An idea of [Jason Becker](http://jsonbecker.com)'s: using `replyr::let` with `knitr` passed parameters.

```{r}
library("replyr")
print(params)

east = 7
let(
  alias=restrictToNameAssignments(params),
  expr={ 
    plot(FN(0.1*(1:20)))
    title(params$title)
  })
```
